mapper.select: select * from customer_inquiry where condition != 0 order by updatedate asc
mapper.insert: insert into customer_inquiry_reply(inquiry_reply_no, inquiry_no, answer_id, answer_branch, answer_rank, answer_name, content) values(seq_inquiry_reply.nextVal, #{inquiry_no}, #{answer_id}, #{answer_branch}, #{answer_rank}, #{answer_name}, #{content})
insert into customer_inquiry(inquiry_no, customer_id, customer_name, title, content) values(seq_inquiry.nextVal, #{customer_id}, #{customer_name}, #{title}, #{content})
